meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jennifer Hughs Matt Bibb Stephanie Jass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6455.

td.p: Jennifer Hughs, a bookstore manager from New York, New York
Matt Bibb, an administrative assistant from North Hollywood, California
Stephanie Jass, a history professor from Milan, Michigan (whose 4-day cash winnings total $90,170)

tr.td: BUFFETT TALKS BUSINESS
(Alex: We're talking about Warren Buffett, of course.)
GEOG. DICT. ABBREV.
(Alex: Geographic dictionary abbreviations.)
A POSITION OF IMPORTANCE
ODD NAMINGS
NORTH AMERICAN LANGUAGES
A HOT LATIN NUMBER

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Warren Buffett delivers the clue.) I believe in productive assets that will keep delivering output in 100 years; people will still buy products from companies like this soft drink maker of which Berkshire Hathaway owns 8.8%')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Warren Buffett delivers the clue.) I believe in productive assets that will keep delivering output in 100 years; people will still buy products from companies like this soft drink maker of which Berkshire Hathaway owns 8.8%

diversification

Matt
')
